pullRequest.title: ecflh001 test, only leave class hook enabled when mod specified
pullRequest.bodyText:
This allows the argument printClassFileLoadMsg to be specified by
itself without changing the test behavior, useful for debugging. No test
specifies only this option atm. noModify+printClassFileLoadMsg can be
used to get the original behavior, leaving the class hook enabled at
startup.
Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com

This allows the argument `printClassFileLoadMsg` to be specified by
itself without changing the test behavior, useful for debugging. No test
specifies only this option atm. `noModify,printClassFileLoadMsg` can be
used to get the original behavior, leaving the class hook enabled at
startup.

Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton <Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com>

nodes.bodyText: Please update the comment for this function that suggests the <modtype> portion of the arguments is required.
